trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Wadsworth
There were no other sightings in Wadsworth on or around April 9th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Saw what looked kinda like a star, after I shot the 1st photos & looked back up it had split into 2 streams of pink light traveling like a shooting star.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home and thought i saw a couple things, but then had to check my sanity - the 1st was what looked like a very short chemtrail - it could've been a cloud, but it was tiny and straight. i thought i saw it hovering and it looked like the "typical" flying saucer. then it was gone, nothing in the sky at that place, not even the "cloud". i saw what looked like a plane maybe 20 ft down the road & pulled over to take a picture. it was sooo small and looked like it could be a airplane, so i decided not to take a picture. when i looked back up it appeared to have gone in a circle. i thought planes didn't do that. there is a small airport nearby (within 5-10 miles) & a major airport about 35 miles away. i got back on the road & turned in my subdivision. this "star" caught my eye, because it looked "fake" or placed somehow, like a sky prop. i stopped to take a picture in the day time because the sun was setting. when i looked back to the sky after taking the first 3 photos rapidly, it had turned pink\rose & split into 2 streams side by side. i rapidly took more photos until i looked up again (without the camera) & it had disappeared. not even another half mile towards my home, i saw it again - or another one. the same short stream of light, like a firework or shooting star - but pink. what is this? i have photos from my iphone.
